sentence: He's come out in support of attorney Harriet Hageman, and he is anticipated to make the race a top priority, including by holding rallies in the Cowboy State.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Eleven interesting races to watch in 2022

sentence: And last September, after Trump endorsed Harriet Hageman's primary challenge against Rep. Liz Cheney in the race for Wyoming's at-large House seat, he and his allies successfully urged some, but not all, of the other anti-Cheney GOP candidates to drop out of the primary and coalesce around Hageman.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: After meeting with Trump, Georgia's Vernon Jones likely to exit GOP gubernatorial primary

sentence: The former president has endorsed a number of their challengers, including Harriet Hageman, who is running against U.S. Representative Liz Cheney of Wyoming, one of Trump's most outspoken critics in the Republican Party.
author: Daniel Bush
title: Georgia Primaries Will Test Trump's Revenge Campaign Against GOP Incumbents
